content: 5 14 25 13 75 13 12 5 inches make your own choice based on your preferred length the cuff measures approx 2 5 cm / 1 inch break cc yarn and continue with mc the cuffs change to smaller needles work as follows rd1 k to bor round 2 *k1 p1* repeat ** to bor repeat round 2 until 8 rds have been worked total bind off with italian bind-off or another stretchy bind-off the neck band from the rs with new mc yarn and smaller needles co 1 st begin the pick-up of sts at the bottom of the henley omit the 4 co sts at the bottom pick up and knit approximately 1 st in each stitch/row until you reach the bottom of the henley co 1 st 9 knitting of course milo the stitch count should be an uneven number and approximately 193 209 217 233 241 257 257 273 281 stitches work back and forth as follows r1 *p1 k1* repeat ** to last st p1 r2 *k1 p1* repeat ** to last st k1 repeat r 1-2 until 3 row have been worked place locking stitch markers where you want your button holes to be place markers for holes 1 stitch before a knit stitch the sample size s i did 4 sts from the bottom and 8 sts in between each hole for 4 buttons you might have to adjust the stitches in between to fit the buttons r4 *k1 p1* repeat ** to m yo rm p2tog* repeat ** to last m yo p2tog rm *k1 p1* repeat ** to last st k1 r5 *p1 k1* repeat ** to last st p1 r6 *k1 p1* repeat ** to last st k1 r7 *p1 k1* repeat ** to last st p1 bind off with italian bind-off or another stretch bind-off sew down the button of the henley to the 4 front cast-on stitches making them overlap place your buttons and sew them on all done almost weave in the ends wash it and block it to your liking happy knitting feel free to share your project online find me on instagram @knittingofcourse 10
